ConnectionStrings.LocalDB: Data Source=(localdb)\MSSQLLocalDB;Initial Catalog=DreamyGadgetDB;Integrated Security=True;Connect Timeout=30;Encrypt=True;Trust Server Certificate=False;Application Intent=ReadWrite;Multi Subnet Failover=False
